headline: Evergy Schedules Conference Call to Discuss 2nd Quarter Results
summary: KANSAS CITY, Mo., July 17, 2025--Evergy, Inc. (NASDAQ: EVRG) announced today it will release its 2025 second quarter earnings Thursday, August 7, 2025, before market open. The company plans to host its quarterly conference call and audio webcast to discuss the results Thursday, August 7, 2025.
